sentences.en: A vivid picture is present to our eye.
sentences.cn: 一幅栩栩如生的画面出现在我们眼前.

sentences.en: Clare was the most vivid member of the family.
sentences.cn: 克莱尔是家庭中最活跃的成员.

sentences.en: He gave a vivid account of his life as a fighter pilot.
sentences.cn: 他生动地描述了他那战斗机飞行员的生活。

sentences.en: He had a vivid picture of her in his mind.
sentences.cn: 他的脑海中清晰地留着她的形象。

sentences.en: He relied on translucent enamels to produce vivid, glowing pictures.
sentences.cn: 他利用半透明瓷漆绘制出鲜艳生动的图画。

sentences.en: He sketched the situation in a few vivid words.
sentences.cn: 他用几句生动的语言简述了局势.

sentences.en: Her dress was a vivid colour.
His novel is a vivid portrayal of life in a mining community.
sentences.cn: 他的小说生动地描绘了矿区的生活.

sentences.en: I have a vivid memory of her face.
sentences.cn: 她的容貌栩栩如生地印在我脑海里.

sentences.en: I’ve got vivid memories of that summer.
sentences.cn: 我对那年夏天记忆犹新。

sentences.en: Our economic construction is vivid with life.
sentences.cn: 我们的经济建设生气勃勃.

sentences.en: Overcooked greens are my most vivid recollection of school dinners.
sentences.cn: 在我对学校午餐的回忆中，印象最深刻的就是蔬菜总是炒过头。

sentences.en: The changing vivid colours of the sunset are really fascinating.
sentences.cn: 日落时变化多端的色彩确实使人心醉神迷.

sentences.en: The changing vivid colours of the sunset fascinated the eye.
sentences.cn: 日落时变化多端的色彩使人看得入迷.

sentences.en: The writer paints a vivid picture of his early life.
sentences.cn: 那位作家生动地描绘了他早年的生活.

sentences.en: Vivid red and pink geraniums cascade over my balcony.
sentences.cn: 鲜艳的红色和粉色的天竺葵从我家的阳台上直挂下去。

sentences.en: What strikes at a first reading is its vivid images.
sentences.cn: 初读时它给人的印象是形象生动.

words.tran_cn: 使生动；使活跃；给与生气

phrases.tran_cn: 生动的描述；生动的报导
逼真模式；栩栩如生的描写

trans.tran_cn: 生动的，（记忆、描述等）清晰的，（人的想像）丰富的，（光、颜色等）鲜艳的，耀眼的
trans.tran_en: vivid memories, dreams, descriptions etc are so clear that they seem real
